channel.title: About the Community Zone category
channel.description:
This is where to post your questions, queries or requests for support from the IATI Community.
Posts can be a specific issues related to publishing or using data, or it could be asking if there is a local IATI Expert in your area who could provide some more in depth support to your organisation.
You should post in this category if:
- You have a question about the standard, publishing or using data
- You are looking for a local IATI Expert to help your organisation
- You want to know where specific pieces of information is available
